comingSoon.title: Coming Soon!
comingSoon.message: We're currently working on this feature. Stay tuned for updates!

update.title: Update Available
update.message: A new version (v{version}) is available. Would you like to download and install it now?
update.linuxMessage: A new version (v{version}) is available. Auto-update is not supported on Linux. Click below to open the downloads page where you can get the latest .deb file.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your workflow and app preferences

statuses.title: Status Columns
statuses.description: Manage your workflow stages and their visibility
statuses.createFirstDesc: Create status columns to organize your workflow
statuses.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the "{name}" status? Tasks with this status will need to be updated manually.
statuses.tip: Drag and drop status columns to reorder them. The order you set here will be reflected in task boards and sprint views. Hidden columns won't appear in the board view but existing tasks keep their status.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Create and manage tags for organizing tasks
tags.createFirstDesc: Create tags to categorize and filter your tasks
tags.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the "{name}" tag? This will not affect existing tasks.
tags.tip: Tags help you categorize tasks across different sprints and status columns. You can add multiple tags to any task for better organization.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.backupDescription: Export your data to migrate to a new device or app version. Import a backup file to restore your data.
dataManagement.clearDataDescription: Delete all tasks, sprints, team members, and settings. This cannot be undone.
dataManagement.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to delete all your tasks, sprints, team members, and board settings? This action cannot be undone. Your preferences (theme, name) will be preserved.

sprintSettings.title: Sprint Settings
sprintSettings.autoFinishDescription: Automatically complete sprints when end date passes. Incomplete tasks will be moved to backlog.

methodology.title: Project Methodology
methodology.description: Choose how you want to manage your projects
methodology.agileDesc: Time-boxed sprints, backlog grooming, velocity tracking. Best for iterative development with regular releases.
methodology.kanbanDesc: Continuous flow, WIP limits, no fixed iterations. Best for maintenance, support, or continuous delivery.
methodology.waterfallDesc: Sequential phases, milestone-based progress. Best for projects with fixed requirements and deadlines.

tasks.title: All Tasks
tasks.description: View and manage all tasks with drag-and-drop
tasks.noMatchFilters: No tasks match your filters. Try clearing the filters or adjusting the date range.
tasks.deleteTaskMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? This action cannot be undone.

fields.title: Title
fields.descriptionPlaceholder: What needs to be done. Markdown is supported.

sprint.title: Sprint Board
sprint.description: Focus on the active sprint and move work to done
sprint.noActiveSprintDesc: Create a new sprint, add tasks to it, and activate it to start your iteration.
sprint.noSprintsYet: No sprints created yet. Start a new sprint cycle to manage your team's workload.
sprint.deleteSprintMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
sprint.deleteTaskMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? This action cannot be undone.

reports.title: Reports
reports.descriptionAgile: Track your team's agile metrics and sprint performance
reports.descriptionKanban: Track your team's flow metrics and work in progress
reports.descriptionWaterfall: Track your team's project progress and milestones
reports.monthlyTrendDesc: Task creation and completion over the last 12 months
reports.teamPerformanceDesc: Tasks completed and points earned by team member
reports.taskTypesDesc: Distribution of stories, bugs, and chores
reports.insightFeatures: Your team is focused on building new features. Great for product growth!
reports.insightBugs: High bug ratio detected. Consider allocating time for stability improvements.
reports.insightMaintenance: Balanced workload with maintenance tasks. Good for long-term health.
reports.insightHighPriority: Many high-priority items in the backlog. Review and re-prioritize if needed.
reports.insightBalanced: Priorities are well-balanced. Keep up the good planning!
reports.insightGreatProgress: Excellent completion rate! Your team is delivering consistently.
reports.insightGoodProgress: Good progress. Try breaking large tasks into smaller ones for faster delivery.
reports.insightNeedsAttention: Completion rate needs attention. Review blockers and team capacity.
reports.insightActiveSprint: Active sprint: {name}. Stay focused on sprint goals!
reports.insightNoSprint: No active sprint. Create one to organize your team's work.
reports.workDistributionDesc: How evenly tasks are distributed among team members
reports.agingAlertDesc: You have tasks that are {days} days old. Consider reviewing and prioritizing them.
reports.spilloverDesc: Tasks that didn't complete in their original sprint

backlog.title: Product Backlog
backlog.description: Prioritize and prepare items for the next sprint
backlog.emptyMessage: Add items to plan your next sprint.

sprints.title: Sprint Management
sprints.description: Plan, activate, and track your sprints
sprints.createFirstDesc: Create your first sprint to start organizing your tasks into time-boxed iterations.
sprints.completeSprintMessage: Are you sure you want to complete "{name}"? This will close the sprint and mark it as completed.
sprints.deleteSprintMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This will not delete the tasks, but they will be moved back to the backlog.

fields.name: Name
fields.goalPlaceholder: What do you want to achieve?

team.title: Team
team.description: Manage your team members and their roles
team.addMemberDesc: Add team members to assign tasks and collaborate effectively.
team.removeMemberMessage: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from the team? This will not delete their assigned tasks.

confirmModal.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to proceed?

emptyState.title: Nothing here yet
emptyState.message: Get started by creating your first item

about.title: About
about.description: Learn more about FlowStack and its creator
about.appDescription: FlowStack is a powerful task management application designed to help teams and individuals organize their work efficiently using agile methodologies, Kanban boards, or traditional project management approaches.
about.supportDescription: If you find FlowStack useful, consider supporting its development. Your contribution helps keep the project alive and enables new features!
about.scanQR: Scan the QR code or click the button to support:
